meanings.definition: A type of soft leather made from goatskin.
meanings.sent1: She admired the luxurious cordovans on display at the boutique.
meanings.sent2: The artisan crafted a beautiful pair of cordovans for the customer.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten played with the cordovans, mistaking them for a toy.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as smooth as a pair of cordovans, soothing everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the cordovans filled the room, evoking memories of the countryside.

meanings.definition: A type of shoe made from cordovan leather.
meanings.sent1: He wore his favorite cordovans to the formal event.
meanings.sent2: The cordovans were polished to a shine, reflecting the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy dancer tripped over his own cordovans, causing a commotion.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the leather used in cordovans.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the cordovans clicking on the pavement echoed through the street.
